info.title: FGCP Demo REST API
info.description:
Demo REST API for the Fujitsu Cloud IaaS Trusted Public S5 (TPS5) aka Fujitsu Global Cloud Platform (FGCP) - generated from fgcp_api.py
Try this out with connexion:
$ pip install connexion
$ connexion run swaggerapi.json --mock=all -v
Browse in http://localhost:5000/ui/

api.description:
This is a simple REST API that allows you to GET resources from the FGCP Demo System. This demo does not support creating, updating or deleting resources.

The URLs for the top-level resources can be found in the 'href' attributes here to get you started.
api.name: FGCP Demo REST API

application/json.description:

The URLs for the top-level resources can be found in the 'href' attributes here to get you started.
